lead_paragraph: Tracy McGrady scored 25 of his 31 points in the second half and made the go-ahead jumper to lift the Houston Rockets to an 84-77 victory against the host Chicago Bulls last night.
snippet: Tracy McGrady scored 25 of his 31 points in the second half and made the go-ahead jumper to lift the Houston Rockets to an 84-77 victory against the host Chicago Bulls last night.
